lore: Centuries ago, the Death Magi of the Magic University of Nex developed a complex ritual that modified the structure of a Leper. The result is a creature that can literally absorb corpses through its skin. It can slightly increase its power in this way, provided the corpses are fresh. After a while, the skeletons of the absorbed creatures emerge from its body and fall off.
menagerieDialog: (It looks at you groggily with a half-baked grin on its face.)
(This creature will always be picked last for the dodgeball team.)
(It gazes at you in admiration. You can't help but find this creature far more endearing than you should.)
(Surely this creature's affliction must be contagious. You should be wearing a mask.)
(This creature is so ugly that, somehow, it's almost cute.)
name: Grave Leper
